text: “Maa tangada humalia gaa dugu ana haihai humalia, ga daamada gaa hai nia huaidu mono mee ala e haga langaadia dangada ala e hai go digau huaidu, le e hai behee? Mee ga haga mouli? Deeai! Ana haihai humalia huogodoo ala nogo hai i mua la ga balumee. Mee gaa made mai i dono de manawa dahi mo ana haihai huaidu.
